htop.description: An interactive process viewer for Unix systems.

wget.description: A free utility for non-interactive download of files from the web.

curl.description: A command-line tool for transferring data with URL syntax.

tree.description: A recursive directory listing program that produces a depth-indented listing of files.

figlet.description: A program for making large letters out of ordinary text.

ncdu.description: A disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface.

fping.description: A command-line tool to send ICMP echo requests to network hosts.
